# hasImages

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the pasteboard contains a nonempty array of images.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasImages: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Employ this property to determine if a pasteboard contains image data.

Do not use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/image] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/images] properties to determine whether a pasteboard contains image data, because doing so consumes resources needlessly.

## Checking for data types on a pasteboard

- **hasColors**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the pasteboard contains contains a nonempty array of colors.
- **hasStrings**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the pasteboard contains a nonempty array of strings.
- **hasURLs**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the pasteboard contains a nonempty array of URLs.
